actions.text: Ms. Oakar asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for five additional positions on the Capitol Police for duty with respect to the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Establishes one additional position of sergeant and four additional positions of detective on the Capitol Police, each for duty with respect to the House of Representatives. States that the former position of a member of the Capitol Police appointed to a position under this Act may not be filled while the member is so serving. Provides that there may not be paid, with respect to a position under this Act, overtime pay for a calendar year that exceeds 25 percent of the annual rate of basic pay for the position.

titles.title: Providing for five additional positions on the Capitol Police for duty with respect to the House of Representatives.
